/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Bare trees line the street, their leafless branches reaching towards the sky, suggesting that the photo was taken during the winter season. The street itself is busy with several cars and buses navigating their way, adding a dynamic element to the scene. On the right side of the street, buildings rise, their architecture hinting at the city's blend of tradition and modernity.
